sentences.english: Clam chowders have --- as the name suggests --- clams and fish stock.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊海鲜杂烩里面还有蛤蜊和鱼类高汤。

sentences.english: Clam chowders have --- as the name suggests --- clams and fish stock.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊海鲜杂烩里面还有蛤蜊和鱼类高汤。

sentences.english: It typically has a few different types of fish, clams, mussels and prawns.
sentences.chinese: 它通常由好几种鱼类，蛤蜊，贻贝和对虾熬成。

sentences.english: Go clamming is also a dangerous work with a willy-willy(typhoon) .
sentences.chinese: 在台风天的拾蛤蜊也是份危险的工作。

sentences.english: How can a clam cram in a cran cream can?
sentences.chinese: 如何把蛤蜊塞进干净的奶油罐子里？

sentences.english: You may try Sanna Clam. It is very tasty.
sentences.chinese: 您可以尝尝桑拿蛤蜊，味道很棒。

sentences.english: Grey whales are submarine bulldozers, feeding on clams and other animals buried in the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 灰鲸是潜艇推土机，喂养蛤蜊和其他埋在海底的动物。

sentences.english: Have a little taste before seasoning, as the clams can be quite salty.
sentences.chinese: 加调料之前尝一下，因为蛤蜊会很咸。

sentences.english: Beef Rib, Pan Seared Scallops, Steamed Clams and Mussels, or Spicy Chicken wing.
sentences.chinese: 牛肋排，香煎带子，蒸蛤蜊和青口贝或者香辣鸡翅翅。

sentences.english: A Chinook Indian woman holds a clam basket.
sentences.chinese: 一位奇努克妇女拿着一个装着蛤蜊的篮子。

sentences.english: Quahog clams are known for their longevity.
sentences.chinese: 蚌蛎类蛤蜊以长寿而著称。

sentences.english: Salmon, clams, mussels , shrimp, tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 三文鱼，蛤蜊，河蚌，虾，番茄酱。

sentences.english: I think I'll start with a crabmeat salad and then half a dozen clams.
sentences.chinese: 我想先来点蟹肉色拉，再来六个蛤蜊肉。

sentences.english: Add the clams, mussels and white wine; cover the pan.
sentences.chinese: 加入蛤蜊，青口和白葡萄酒，盖上锅盖。

sentences.english: I know you like Clam Chowder, because you like Pina Colada.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你喜欢海鲜蛤蜊汤，因为你喜欢‘椰林飘香’。

sentences.english: Shrimp, snow crab, and scallop in shell, clam.

definition: Tellina iridescens (a bivalve mollusk)/any similar small clam
